snippet: No one immediately claimed responsibility for the attack, which took place in the Giro district of Ghazni Province and killed civilians headed to a wedding, an official said.
lead_paragraph: No one immediately claimed responsibility for the attack, which took place in the Giro district of Ghazni Province and killed civilians headed to a wedding, an official said.

headline.main: Roadside Bombing in Afghanistan Kills 12 Civilians
headline.print_headline: Roadside Bombing in Afghanistan Kills 12 Civilians
